unnormalised: Crop insurance, crucial for us farmers, eh? Heard Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY) payout was slow in UP this year. Any updates? Lost half my bajra crop near Kanpur during that flash flood on 26/07/2023 at 16:30 hrs. Applied on 01/08/2023. Still waiting! Rs. 5000/acre investment gone! How's everyone else faring? Need this by Diwali (12/11/2023), warna… Jai Kisan!
normalised: Crop insurance, crucial for us farmers, eh? Heard Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (P M F B Y) payout was slow in U P this year. Any updates? Lost half my bajra crop near Kanpur during that flash flood on twenty sixth July two thousand and twenty three at sixteen thirty hours. Applied on first August two thousand and twenty three. Still waiting! Rupee five thousand per acre investment gone! How's everyone else faring? Need this by Diwali (twelfth November two thousand and twenty three), warna… Jai Kisan!
